bowerbird：园丁鸟satin bowerbird：缎蓝园丁鸟；缎蓝亭鸟parrot：鹦鹉
缎蓝园丁鸟(satin bowerbird)用树枝搭建的鸟窝有两面墙,长约12英寸(30厘米),高14英寸(36厘米)。墙的前面是用树枝搭建的平台,还用五颜六色的物体加以装饰;墙壁.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various birds of the Australian region whose males build ornamented structures resembling bowers in order to attract females
